description: This file defines a React functional component named RecipeForm, which provides a user interface for creating or editing recipe data. The component includes form fields for recipe title, description, image URL, ingredients, steps, and tags. It handles form submission, validation, dynamic list management for ingredients and steps, and error handling. It emits a RecipeInput object upon submission.

methods.name: RecipeForm
methods.description: React functional component for a recipe input form, managing state for each recipe field, validation, and form submission.
